mapper.select: SELECT model.name as model, carType.name as carType, fuel.name as fuel, c.car_img, c.car_dayprice, c.car_hourprice, c.car_capacity FROM car c JOIN Common model ON model.code = c.car_model JOIN Common carType ON carType.code = c.car_type JOIN Common fuel ON fuel.code = c.car_fuel WHERE c.car_img IN (SELECT DISTINCT car_img FROM car);
